references: I. Niven, Averages of exponents in factoring integers, Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 22 (1969), pp. 356-360.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Niven's Constant
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
mathematica: rd[n_] := rd[n] = RealDigits[ N[1 + Sum[1 - 1/Zeta[j], {j, 2, 2^n}], 105]][[1]]; rd[n = 4]; While[rd[n] =!= rd[n - 1], n++]; Niven = FromDigits[{rd[n], 1}]; ContinuedFraction[Niven, 100] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 30 2012 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
